org.jruyi.common

Interface ITimerAdmin


  • public interface ITimerAdmin
    A service for creating scalable timers backed by timing wheel algorithm.
    Since:
    2.3

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ITimer createTimer(int wheelSize)
      Returns a timer with the specified wheelSize and one second as the tick time.
      ITimer createTimer(int wheelSize, long tickTime)
      Returns a timer with the given wheelSize and tickTime.

    • Method Detail

      • createTimer

        ITimer createTimer(int wheelSize)
        Returns a timer with the specified wheelSize and one second as the tick time.

        It behaves exactly the same as 

         createTimer(wheelSize, 1000L);
        Parameters:
        wheelSize - the minimum size of the timing wheel to create
        Returns:
        a timer
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if wheelSize is negative

      • createTimer

        ITimer createTimer(int wheelSize,
                   long tickTime)
        Returns a timer with the given wheelSize and tickTime.
        Parameters:
        wheelSize - size of the timing wheel to create
        tickTime - milliseconds per tick
        Returns:
        a timer
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if wheelSize is negative or tickTime is not positive
